item.description:
Do you like American music?
I like American music.
STEVE likes American music, baby.

Join him to see the Violent Femmes show at Mohegan Sun's Wolf Den!

I know what you're thinking: How does this relate to ethnic dining?

Let me break it down for you: Steve is an Ethnic Dining Enthusiast, as well as an organizer for the Southeast CT Social Group. He asked that I cross-list this event so that he can get a big group together.

Day after day he bribed me by saying those who attend will eat dinner at the Bamboo Forest before the show.

So I agreed, but mostly because I'm a huge Violent Femmes fan. Unfortunately, I will be out of town. But every time I look at that ugly moon, it will remind me of you.

Let yourself go wild, like a blister in the sun! Meet Steve at the East Hartford Commuter Lot at 5:30 to carpool, so you don't have to be standin' on a corner, waitin' for a bus. You will have dinner upon arrival at the casino, followed by what will most likely be a great show.

(I'm immensely jealous already.)

**Shows at the Wolf Den are first come, first serve...no tickets, no cost.**

But he still needs a head count a couple of days prior to the event in order to make a reservation at Bamboo Forest.

Contact Steve with any questions (hhhjkkk@yahoo.com; 860-655-8167).



Wolf Den Schedule:
http://www.mohegansun...

Bamboo Forest at Mohegan Sun (menu link at the right of page):
http://www.mohegansun...

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Violent Femmes with Bamboo
